column4: Im amased the Dell is allowing you to by ubuntu systems !!!!!! It is Totally Amasing !!!
and Extreamly usefull to the comunity
why ? ubuntu is a very easy to use distro, well suited for new linux users and adaptable for more experienced ones
which ever distro  big computer makers/sellers chose to pre-install gives hardware makers a good incentive to produce linux drivers , which is the major point
